attributes.additional_details: They're pointless. They're never ending. They're dangerous.
attributes.background: To make fireworks silent. Not just for pets but for returning military and well let's be honest, they're just annoying and pointless.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
